definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: The services by LPKF will be compensated according to the agreements as concluded.
sentences.chinese: 樂普科的服務將按照達成的價款予以償付。

sentences.english: Article 159 The buyer shall effect the payment in accordance with the contracted price.
sentences.chinese: 第一百五十九條買受人應當按照約定的數額支付價款。

sentences.english: May we have your check in settlement of this invoice-soon?
sentences.chinese: 爲了結算這張發票價款，請即送下支票爲荷。

sentences.english: After the economic contract is performed, the deposit shall be returned or set off against the price.
sentences.chinese: 經濟合同履行後，定金應當收回，或者抵作價款。

sentences.english: If the party that receives the deposit fails to perform the contract, it shall return twice the amount of the deposit.
sentences.chinese: 經濟合同履行後，定金應當收回，或者抵作價款。

sentences.english: The buyer shall pay the price at the prescribed time.
sentences.chinese: 第一百六十一條買受人應當按照約定的時間支付價款。

sentences.english: Dividends are payments by the corporation to equity shareholders based on an apportionment of earnings.
sentences.chinese: 股利是公司基於利潤的分配而支付給資產股東的價款。

sentences.english: After the debtor has discharged his debt, the deposit shall either be retained as partial payment of the debt or be returned.
sentences.chinese: 債務人履行債務後，定金應當抵作價款或者收回。

sentences.english: The buyer shall pay the price in the prescribed amount.
sentences.chinese: 第一百五十九條買受人應當按照約定的數額支付價款。

sentences.english: The buyer shall pay the price at the prescribed place.
sentences.chinese: 第一百六十一條買受人應當按照約定的時間支付價款。

sentences.english: Article 161 The buyer shall effect the payment at the agreed time.
sentences.chinese: 第一百六十一條買受人應當按照約定的時間支付價款。

sentences.english: Article 160 The buyer shall effect the payment at the agreed place.
sentences.chinese: 第一百六十條買受人應當按照約定的地點支付價款。

definition: (of a sum of money etc) receivable
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
to recover (stolen property)/to pursue and force sb to give back the spoils
to have exclusive selling rights/to be the sole agent for a production unit or firm
debt security/collateralized debt obligation (CDO), type of bond
to reduce payment/to annul (debts, bills, taxes etc)/to let sb off paying
